author: deme1744
content: Up until a few weeks ago, nimbus  (fluffy) fleet nodes were serving (old, not recent) state data. I have since then however disable the state network on those fleet nodes as I saw no point in keeping that up if no development was going to be done on recent state.

author: deme1744
content: The nimbus portal node currently still allows however to run the state network. So if you want to set it up locally, you could use it. But you would have to inject that state data also to test with.
